Title of your project </br>
Can NUS ISS Master help you land 21st century sexiest job? </br>
</br>
Short summary of the project</br>
Collected the public profiles of past graduates for MTECH NUS-ISS program and correlating that with other information such as salary and industries information to provide additional background for the analysis.  </br>
</br>
Installation</br>
Just checkout the whole folder and you should be able to run the script as it is after deploying the software to your raspberry pi. You would need a valid LinkedIn account to scrape the public profiles, for the database storage, MongoDB and SQL Server installation may be required.</br>
</br>
How to use it </br>
The data and the analysis can be use as it is.</br>
</br>
Contribute</br>
If you've made some upgrades or have recommendations to me on how to improve, please feel free to share your thoughts.</br>
</br>
Support</br>
